publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3329 Tricia Marwick on behalf of the Waverley Railway Bill (Scotland) Committee: Waverley Railway (Scotland) Bill - Preliminary Stage—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Waverley Railway (Scotland) Bill and that the Bill should proceed as a Private Bill. Supported by: Gordon Jackson*

S2M-3329 Tricia Marwick on behalf of the Waverley Railway Bill (Scotland) Committee: Waverley Railway (Scotland) Bill - Preliminary Stage—That the Parliament agrees to the general principles of the Waverley Railway (Scotland) Bill and that the Bill should proceed as a Private Bill. Supported by: Gordon Jackson
